pr_title: Integrate with cloud for safe-to-update check

timeline.message:
Integrate with cloud for safe-to-update check

Integrate with cloud for safe-to-update check. Add e2e test, make e2e
test to use cloud gamma endpoint.

timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: It's not a TODO, it's modifying the setRequest
replies.author: ShirleyZheng92

timeline.bodyText: why do we need a new test, don't we have this covered by other tests?
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: the SKIP_SAFETY_CHECK is not tested in e2e test, therefore I add here
replies.author: ShirleyZheng92

timeline.bodyText:
This will only change the FCS endpoint to Gamma, the CMS endpoint seems to be coming from here https://github.com/aws/aws-greengrass-kernel/blob/master/src/main/java/com/aws/iot/evergreen/easysetup/DeviceProvisioningHelper.java#L74 We should be changing this as well,
This is the endpoint information I got from the cloud team today -
For ComponentManagementService:
Beta: https://uqtyx1gsuk.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/Beta
Gamma: https://nztb5z87k6.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/Gamma
timeline.author: shaguptashaikh

replies.bodyText: Tried the CMS Gamma endpoint and get InvalidInputException of "Artifacts can't be empty" . Need to follow up with cloud on that later. Let's keep the Beta CMS endpoint for now
replies.author: ShirleyZheng92
